nodes.text: Chandrilan grappaberries were a type of berry that grew on the planet Chandrila. Grappaberries grown in vineyards around the city of Nayli were fermented and used to make Chandrilan Blue '439, a vintage of fine wine.
Chandrilan grappaberries were mentioned in the 2015 Star Wars Roleplaying expansion Strongholds of Resistance, which was published by Fantasy Flight Games.
